parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Pre-defined variable for the eastern [[Side|side]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''east'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS:<code>?((side _unit) == [[east]]) : [[hint]] "This is a eastern unit!"</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF:<code>[[if]] (([[side]] _unit) == [[east]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "This is a eastern unit!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[west]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on April 17, 2007 - 10:46</dd>
<dt class="note">'''[[User:Maruk|Maruk]] ([[User talk:Maruk|talk]])'''<dd class="note">
In ArmA terms OPFOR, BLUFOR, Independents and Civilians are used in the front end UI.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
